item.description:
Ciao Tutti,

We are all invited to John Del Negro's house in Newport RI on October 10th at 4:00pm for an Italiana Festa II. We are going to have food, wine, italian music and more. I ask if you could please be so kind to make or take something ( ITALIAN OF COURSE) to help out. John has been gracious enough to open his house for this wonderful Meetup. I hope all can come to this exciting Meetup. Please RSVP Yes if you mean YES. I will need to give John an accurate count on who is coming for this evening. So please RSVP YES if you are 100%. Hope to see you there.

Ciao,
John Amato
Organizer

group.name: The Rhode Island Italian Language Meetup Group

item.name: UNA FESTA ITALIANA A CASA DI JOHN DEL NEGRO
